summary: Increased frenzy effect duration for crafted poisons to 30 seconds.
descriptionHtml:
What it does?
Frenzy Poisons you\'ve crafted, poison enemies for 30 seconds instead of default 10 seconds. 

I felt that this allows for better use of the frenzy poison, especially to assassinate someone through reverse-pickpocket.

I apologize that I didn\'t increase the duration any further. Otherwise, the cost of frenzy poison increases disproportionately and unbalances the game.

Installation:
1) Extract the files in data folder.
2) Enable the .esp
3) Play

Caution: Didn\'t test it with Dragonborn DLC yet. Creating a Frenzy poison with Boar Tusk may not exactly give the same duration.

Disclaimer: Modders may use this however they want, provided they give me credit.
author: dagincourt88
